TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_ciid, title = ciid, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/ciid} }

S.FORM: ciid (kamu nu Hulam: 樹枝 ) lahad sa ku canacanan a kilang atu lutuk mulangaw tu ciid atu lamit i saayaway. u iluc ku adidi'ay a ciid. izaw ku sikulitay atu mulangaway a nazipa'an i paduh nu ciid. mitudung kina nazipa'an i ciid tu uzip nu kilang. lacul ciid atu iluc nu ciid, adidingay a ciid, adidiay a ciid, baluhayay a ciid, mangaduay a ciid, i tini lahad nu lutulutukan atu lahad nu kilakilangan a sasunanaman a cudad, nipatuduan siduma u mapatelekay ku angangan a kilang atu malikaku'ay nu ciid a kilang. u ciid nu kilang a sikasibalu, u aadihan tu nikatanektek a sakahenulan piadihan, nika pelu'an nu pahpah sa u kadit疤痕 malecad tu u sakahenulan, u ciid nu banges nu kilang idaw ku pisulitan nu i hekalay a micidekay, caay ka u kulit sa atu kulebut, caay kalecad nu kilang atu sapakay caang atu pahpah picidekay a masadicem, u nu ciid nnu kilang amin. u masaciiday nu heci maadih tu nikakibetul atu kasasiduma, atu idaway hakiya nalaadan區間 nikadukaan nikahidaan. ciid nu kilang pahtatusaen, nu lutukay a ciid atu sikalahecian a ceka'. siceka'ay a nikalaheci sapacidekay nu ciid, sipakay tapiingan amin masaciid, nikatabaki apuyu'an atu haymaw sa mucelak, idaw ku mapasulitan i ciid nu kasumadan nikakimulu nikadukaan. mihcaan nu ciid atu nikacelakan taneng pisausi i kasienawan i nu ciidan kasibaluan a kadit atu masakimuluay a duka, sipakay nu ciid nikatanayaan a palucek. namakay i zitinay a sulit tanaya' tu ku ciid nu kilang. 樹的枝芽長長了. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan wiki-樹枝

ciid (kamo no Holam: 樹枝 ) lahad sa ko canacanan a kilang ato lotok molangaw to ciid ato lamit i saayaway. o iloc ko adidi'ay a ciid. izaw ko sikolitay ato molangaway a nazipa'an i padoh no ciid. mitodong kina nazipa'an i ciid to ozip no kilang. lacol ciid ato iloc no ciid, adidingay a ciid, adidiay a ciid, balohayay a ciid, mangadoay a ciid, i tini lahad no lotolotokan ato lahad no kilakilangan a sasonanaman a codad, nipatodoan sidoma o mapatelekay ko angangan a kilang ato malikako'ay no ciid a kilang. o ciid no kilang a sikasibalo, o aadihan to nikatanektek a sakahenolan piadihan, nika pelo'an no pahpah sa o kadit疤痕 malecad to o sakahenolan, o ciid no banges no kilang idaw ko pisolitan no i hekalay a micidekay, caay ka o kolit sa ato kolebot, caay kalecad no kilang ato sapakay caang ato pahpah picidekay a masadicem, o no ciid nno kilang amin. o masaciiday no heci maadih to nikakibetol ato kasasidoma, ato idaway hakiya nalaadan區間 nikadokaan nikahidaan. ciid no kilang pahtatosaen, no lotokay a ciid ato sikalahecian a ceka'. siceka'ay a nikalaheci sapacidekay no ciid, sipakay tapiingan amin masaciid, nikatabaki apoyo'an ato haymaw sa mocelak, idaw ko mapasolitan i ciid no kasomadan nikakimolo nikadokaan. mihcaan no ciid ato nikacelakan taneng pisaosi i kasienawan i no ciidan kasibaloan a kadit ato masakimoloay a doka, sipakay no ciid nikatanayaan a palocek. namakay i zitinay a solit tanaya' to ko ciid no kilang. 樹的枝芽長長了. namakayniay a nasolitan nasakamoan ato natinengan wiki-樹枝
